metadata.summary: Execute AWS CLI commands directly from LimaCharlie to interact with EC2, IAM, and other AWS services using access keys stored in secrets manager
metadata.primary_use_case: Automate AWS infrastructure responses like stopping EC2 instances based on security telemetry from AWS CloudTrail

extracted_apis.description: Stop EC2 instances using instance IDs with region specification
Execute AWS CLI commands through LimaCharlie extension framework

cross_refs.description: Core Cloud CLI extension concepts and usage patterns required before AWS-specific implementation
